resources.string: Guinness Book Of Records holds the record for being the book most stolen from Public Libraries
In Cleveland, Ohio it is illegal to catch mice without a hunting license
The parachute was invented by Da Vinci in 1515
A goldfish has a memory span of about 8 seconds
Your right lung takes in more air than your left one does
In Sweden there is a ski-thru McDonalds
Babies are born without knee caps. They don\'t appear until the child reaches 2-6 years of age
The hardness of ice is similar to that of concrete
No word in the English dictionary rhymes with "MONTH"
